qas.question: What cartel has been known to be in Oklahoma city?

context: With regards to Mexican drug cartels, Oklahoma City has traditionally been the territory of the notorious <a0_0>Juárez Cartel<a0_0/>, but the Sinaloa Cartel has been reported as trying to establish a foothold in Oklahoma City. There are many rival gangs in Oklahoma City, one whose headquarters has been established in the city, the Southside Locos, traditionally known as Sureños.
